name: Galaxy Black I Characters and Classes
name_original: Galaxy Black I Characters and Classes
description:
First in the Galaxy Black series.   A full generation system for imperial aliens as NPCs or as full player characters, with adjustable but deep levels of granularity.   All of the core classes for Galaxy Black are contained within.  All fully compatible with DCC.   

Note:  this is part of the Galaxy Black series and is not a complete game unto itself.  IT requires the DCC RPG and Galaxy Black II Magic, Metaphysics, and Psychic powers.   

Galaxy black is a science fiction and space fantasy toolkit for your DCC RPG game.  With Galaxy Black you should be able to fake your way through your favorite SF franchise without any problems at all – from golden age space opera to grotty modern post-cyberpunk, from the gutter to the stars, and all points in between.  

Galaxy black is also, for those who want it, a setting, showing one example of how using all the elements in the book (and there are a lot of them!) together can work, using a traditional golden age Galactic Empire as a model.

Galaxy black is generators!  Make worlds, cultures, aliens, gods, and technology, use the campaign frameworks and adventure generators to inspire or map out a whole adventure, a whole campaign! 

Galaxy black has character classes, psionics, weird alien magic, demons, daemons, and terrifying new vistas of unreality
